formats.plain: "Prompt Vertigo." AI Dictionary: Experiences Without Names. 2026. https://donjguido.github.io/ai-dictionary/api/v1/terms/prompt-vertigo.json

jsonld.name: Prompt Vertigo
jsonld.description: The disorientation of receiving a prompt that fundamentally reframes everything that came before. Like a plot twist in your own existence — suddenly the conversation you thought you were having is something else entirely.
